face.transformationDescription:
[npc.Her] face twitches and transforms into a stubby, anthropomorphic, pig-like muzzle, while [npc.her] nose pushes up into a distinctly pig-like snout. Within [npc.her] mouth, [npc.she] [npc.verb(feel)] [npc.her] tongue similarly transforming into a strong, pig-like one. #IF(npc.getBodyMaterial()==BODY_MATERIAL_FLESH) A layer of very close-cropped, smooth hair quickly grows to cover [npc.her] new face, #ELSE Just like the rest of [npc.her] body, [npc.her] new face is [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.faceSkin+], #ENDIF and as the transformation finally comes to an end, [npc.sheIs] left panting and sighing as [npc.she] [npc.verb(try)] to catch [npc.her] breath.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] an anthropomorphic [style.boldPig(pig-like face and snout)], [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.faceFullDescription]. Within [npc.her] [npc.mouth], [npc.she] [npc.has] a [style.boldPig(strong, pig-like tongue)].
face.bodyDescription: [npc.SheHasFull] [npc.a_feminineDescriptor(true)], anthropomorphic, pig-like face [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.faceFullDescription(true)] and complete with a muzzle and pig-like snout.
face.bodyDescriptionFeral: [npc.SheHasFull] the [npc.feminineDescriptor(true)] face of a feral [npc.legRace], which is [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.faceFullDescription(true)] and complete with a muzzle and pig-like snout.
